page.title: 01Introduction.
page.content:
Our block is situated in the{Peak {Park}area of Derbyshire. It includes part of the{River Dove}with the beautiful{Beresford, Wolfscote}and {Biggin Dales. The agricultural land is divided into small fields which are surrounded by dry-stone walls. The village of{Biggin}with its population of approximately{275 people is situated in the most northernly corner of our block. Lack of public transport makes the village fairly isolated and amenities are few. However, the village has become quite well known for the{annual Autumn {sheep sales. There are many disused{lead mines}in the area.
{
